name: ext_R4_Specimen_co_fastingStatus
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Specimen.collection.fastingStatus[x] for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents Specimen.collection.fastingStatus[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Specimen|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Whether or how long patient abstained from food and/or drink
element.definition: Abstinence or reduction from some or all food, drink, or both, for a period of time prior to sample collection.
